message.body: Hey, I heard a rumor that you and Simone were brunching today. Is it true? Do you want extra company?
I fail planned. I'm in Boston right now

Ah ok! So I am sorry to text about this, but Lego died last week and I am a giant mess. I'm kind of trying to avoid being at home :( anyway, I hope your thanksgiving was better, I had been thinking we should catch up.
I'm sorry to hear that. I didn't know obviously. Well I'm usually available. I'll be home this evening
Yeah maybe one day this week? I've been telling people as I talk to them pretty much, I'll face fb at some point but :/
Sure. I think I'm busy tues but otherwise free
